events.title: Spring Tennis Championship
events.description: Annual tennis championship featuring both singles and doubles matches. Open to all skill levels.

events.title: Pickleball Tournament Series
events.description: Monthly pickleball tournament with rotating partners. Great for networking and improving your game.

events.description: Weekend beach volleyball tournament with professional exhibition matches.

events.title: Mixed Doubles Tennis Open
events.description: Mixed doubles tournament with prize pool and refreshments provided.

events.title: Pickleball Skills Workshop
events.description: Learn advanced pickleball techniques from certified instructors.

events.title: Indoor Volleyball League
events.description: 8-week indoor volleyball league with divisions for all skill levels.
